TopicTitle: More info about vehicle in VAB?

Articles.Content:
Could we have a display that shows the mass and TWR of your vehicle while you're in the VAB? Right now, AFAIK, you have to launch it and go to map view to see the mass, and while you can calculate the TWR from the engine thrust rating and that, again it requires going to map view.

A delta-v readout would also be nice (though possibly trickier due to Isp changes with altitude - maybe an "in vacuum" number?).

Showing vehicle parameters (e.g., weight, cost and delta-v) is on the [thread=36863]What Not to Suggest List[/thread]. I'd advise you take a look through it -- it has some links to mods you can use in the meantime.

This one's a fairly common suggestion, I'm afraid, and it may come along soon enough, though I can't speak for Squad... I've heard the KerbalEDU mod was intended to have this information... it may end up being that this information ends up showing up in the stock game around a similar timeframe to KerbalEDU, and I certainly hope it makes it into the stock game eventually. xD
